stripped_text: Gain 1 credit when your turn begins. Whenever you gain credits through a card ability other than from NASX, you may spend up to 2 credits to place that many power counters on NASX. click,trash: Gain 2 credits for each power counter on NASX.
text:
Gain 1[credit] when your turn begins.
Whenever you gain credits through a card ability other than from NASX, you may spend up to 2[credit] to place that many power counters on NASX.
[click],[trash]: Gain 2[credit] for each power counter on NASX.
title: NASX
